content:
There are several halal beach resorts in Bali. Here are a few options:

1. Grand Mirage Resort & Thalasso Bali - Located in Nusa Dua, this beachfront resort offers halal food, prayer facilities, and separate swimming pools for men and women.
2. Meliã Bali - Also located in Nusa Dua, this luxury resort offers halal food, prayer facilities, and a private beach.
3. The Westin Resort Nusa Dua - This beachfront resort in Nusa Dua offers halal food, prayer facilities, and a private beach.
4. Padma Resort Legian - This beachfront resort in Legian offers halal food and prayer facilities, as well as a private beach and a kids' club.
5. The Sakala Resort Bali - Located in Nusa Dua, this beachfront resort offers halal food, prayer facilities, and a private beach.

It is always a good idea to check with the resort beforehand to confirm their halal facilities and services.
